name: Holey Moley (bitDecay Games)
description:
A snake threatens your and all of the Naked Mole Rats. Dig in the pseudo-3D world to save as many younglings as you can on your way to the Queen's den.

Keyboard Controls:

Arrow Keys / WASD -- Movement

C/V / Q/W  -- Shift layers in/out

XBOX Controller:

D-Pad -- Movement

A/B   -- Shift layers in/out

Made for Ludum Dare 48

Theme: Deeper and Deeper
